attributes.review: This app sucked booty. It made my phone very slow and I don’t like trump, if I could rate 0 stars I would. It’s so glitchy and such a waste of storage🙄. Also, I’m Hispanic and I don’t support the “bUiLd a wAlL” bc if it wasn’t for my family coming, I wouldn’t be here today😎
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

Hope he goes down and this app as well. Please remove this app as this is a disgrace to the country. But I’m a serious note it does cuz damage to my phone when I open the app.

attributes.title: Mother died

attributes.review: My uncle has terrible epilepsy and as soon as he opened the app it lagged and the screen started flashing sending him into attack. He’s still in bed a day later recovering. No seizure warning or anything. When emailing the team of this app they replied sarcastically saying “with all due respect, maybe he should do more research before downloading an app.” There is NOTHING that states flashing lights, not even a warning.
attributes.title: Bad App

attributes.review: As soon as the app loaded, I started to feel my lungs fill with mucus and hatred for my neighbor who is not the same color as me. Out of nowhere. I also suddenly felt the need to surrender my rights as a female. I flushed my birth control and immediately went to my sewing machine to make an apron (as I’ve never owned one). I’m just so glad I have relatively small feet so I am able to stand closer to the sink and stove.
attributes.title: I caught Covid AND racism

attributes.review: This app has is not helpful at all, I was trying to give this 🍊 a chance for his money but I’ve been lied to. I feel uncomfortable in this app knowing that is made by a childMolester which is disgusting on its own. I feel so disappointed that this is what it has come to this app is very racist.   NOT RECOMMENDED I like my apps like I like my man diverse.
attributes.title: I feel like my innocents have been take away from me 🧚🏿‍♂️

attributes.review: How do I even start with this I down loaded this app to try and find a way to vote for our president. This app took 4 hours to download with perfection internet, it also completely wrecked my phone, be careful when you open the app there is a scary orange man. I would give this app -10 stars if I could but I can’t so one star it is. I don’t not recommend ever getting this app!!
attributes.title: Dump trump 2020

attributes.review: at first i got the app and everything was fine, but then i kept seeing some old raggedy cheeto, i just though it was a glitch so i left the app alone for the rest of the day, but i was woken up in the middle of the night by a cult sacrificing my mother😡😡😡i thought it was just a coincidence, but then after they were done sacrificing my mother they came in and tried to look for my father, but i was already looking for him before and i saw a note on the counter that said, “left to get milk” and yesterday’s date😔and when i went back on the app the next day the disgusting cheeto was still there🤢🤢overall terrible experience.
attributes.title: very angry😡😡

attributes.review: I got this app to see what the most modern and revolutionized president was up to. When I clicked to enter it just showed an ugly orange fossil of a person that almost looked racist, homophobic, and seemed stupid? He seems like the type of person to be against babies being born in the ninth month. Oh wait... Atleast he doesn’t think that the USA is a brand right? RIGHT?!?! oh my god how is this man our president.
attributes.title: What a terrible app.

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app, i felt an ache in the lower left of my mouth (like really bad). which is really sad bc my teeth usually love donald trump. anyway, i decided that it was a weird coincidence and i was just gonna move on and continue looking at the app. but it was too painful. with every second i spent on the app, my aches got worse. as soon as i left the app, my aches got better but i still called my dentist. turns out, i literally needed a root canal even though i went to the dentist last week and they said everything was great and no cavities. now i have to get a root canal and it was this apps fault.
attributes.title: i had to get a root canal after downloading
attributes.userName: my teeth are rotting from this
